review: I'm getting treatment for my pre pregnancy and post pregnancy from Dr. Mala Prakash and Dr. Nikita.Dr.Nikita spends a lot of time in understanding the patient, what they're going through and guide accordingly. I'm very happy to be associated with this doctor

review: After numerous attempts and visits to various hospitals and doctors, by God's grace and all thanks to Doctor Nikita's eye for detail, I was able to concieve in the very first attempt.
